page.title: 14ESSENTIAL SERVICES continued
page.content: He also keeps an eye open for any crimes. The Police men and women in the Community Liaison come to schools and talk to the children. {EDUCATION SURVEY} We sent out questionnaires about Education. 66% said that{exams}set are appropriate and 30% said they did not know. 83% said{teaching methods}were good, 6% said they were not and 11% did not know. On the subject of the{teachers' {strike}28% said they were on the teachers' side, 11% said they were not, 29% thought it unnecessary, 17% thought it unfair on the teachers and 14% were illegible. 51% thought{corporal punishment should be allowed. 57% said that there ought to be a {uniform}in all schools. 100% said breaktimes were long enough.
